trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Compare-Object
trans-unit.target: Compare-Object

trans-unit.source: Compare-Object
trans-unit.target: Compare-Object

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Compares two sets of objects.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個物件集。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Compare-Object** cmdlet compares two sets of objects.
trans-unit.target: **Compare-object** cmdlet 會比較兩個物件集。

trans-unit.source: One set of objects is the reference set, and the other set is the difference set.
trans-unit.target: 其中一組物件的參考集，而另一組差異組。

trans-unit.source: The result of the comparison indicates whether a property value appeared only in the object from the reference set (indicated by the \<= symbol), only in the object from the difference set (indicated by the =\> symbol) or, if the *IncludeEqual* parameter is specified, in both objects (indicated by the == symbol).
trans-unit.target: 比較結果會指出是否屬性值只出現在物件從參考組 (由 \<= 符號)，只有在從不同的物件設定 (以 =\> 符號) 或者，如果 *IncludeEqual* 指定參數，在這兩個物件 （= = 符號表示）。

trans-unit.source: If the reference set or the difference set is null, this cmdlet generates a terminating error.
trans-unit.target: 如果參考設定或差異組為 null，此 cmdlet 會產生終止錯誤。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Compare the content of two text files
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 比較兩個文字檔的內容

trans-unit.source: This command compares the contents of two text files.
trans-unit.target: 此命令比較兩個文字檔的內容。

trans-unit.source: It displays only the lines that appear in one file or in the other file, not lines that appear in both files.
trans-unit.target: 它只會顯示出現在一個檔案或另一個檔案中的行，不會顯示同時出現在這兩個檔案中的行。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Compare each line of content in two text files
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 比較兩個文字檔案中內容的每一行

trans-unit.source: This command compares each line of content in two text files.
trans-unit.target: 此命令比較兩個文字檔中每一行的內容。

trans-unit.source: It displays all lines of content from both files, indicating whether each line appears in only Textfile1.txt or Textfile2.txt or whether each line appears in both files.
trans-unit.target: 它會顯示來自兩個檔案的所有內容行，指出每一行是否只出現在 Textfile1.txt 或 Textfile2.txt 中，或每一行是否同時出現在這兩個檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Compare two sets of process objects
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 比較兩個處理程序物件的集合

trans-unit.source: These commands compare two sets of process objects.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會比較兩組處理程序物件。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **Get-Process** cmdlet to get the processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 **Get-process** cmdlet 來取得電腦上的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet stores the processes in the $Processes_Before variable.
trans-unit.target: 指令程式會將 $Processes_Before 變數中的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The second command launches Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會啟動 [記事本]。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the **Get-Process** cmdlet again and stores the resulting processes in the $Processes_After variable.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會使用 **Get-process** cmdlet 一次，並儲存所產生的處理 $Processes_After 變數中。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command uses the **Compare-Object** cmdlet to compare the two sets of process objects.
trans-unit.target: 第四個命令會使用 **Compare-object** 來比較兩個指令程式會設定處理程序物件。

trans-unit.source: It displays the differences between them, which include the new instance of Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 它會顯示他們，其中包括 [記事本] 的新執行個體之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -CaseSensitive
trans-unit.target: -CaseSensitive

trans-unit.source: Indicates that comparisons should be case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 指出比較應區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: -Culture
trans-unit.target: 特性文化

trans-unit.source: Specifies the culture to use for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用於比較的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: -DifferenceObject
trans-unit.target: -DifferenceObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects that are compared to the reference objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定要與參照物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: -ExcludeDifferent
trans-unit.target: -ExcludeDifferent

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet displays only the characteristics of compared objects that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式會顯示相等的比較物件的特性。

trans-unit.source: -IncludeEqual
trans-unit.target: -IncludeEqual

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet displays characteristics of compared objects that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式會顯示特性的比較相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, only characteristics that differ between the reference and difference objects are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 預設只會顯示參照物件與差異物件之間不同的特性。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the item with which you are working.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表您正在使用之項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of properties of the reference and difference objects to compare.
trans-unit.target: 指定要比較的參考和差異物件的屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: -ReferenceObject
trans-unit.target: -ReferenceObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of objects used as a reference for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 指定做為參考用來比較物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: -SyncWindow
trans-unit.target: -SyncWindow

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of adjacent objects that this cmdlet inspects while looking for a match in a collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個指令程式會尋找相符項目集合中的物件時檢查的相鄰物件數目。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet examines adjacent objects when it does not find the object in the same position in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 當它找不到該物件在集合中的相同位置時，這個指令程式會檢查相鄰的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is \[Int32\]::MaxValue, which means that this cmdlet examines the entire object collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 \[Int32\]:: MaxValue，這表示此指令程式會檢查整個物件集合。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a **DifferenceObject** object to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送 **DifferenceObject** 這個指令程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None, or the objects that are different
trans-unit.target: 無、 或不同的物件

trans-unit.source: When you use the *PassThru* parameter, **Compare-Object** returns the objects that differed.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 *PassThru* 參數， **Compare-object** 傳回有差異的物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
